definition[0]: a long narrow open container that holds water or food for animals
definition[1]: a short period of low activity, low prices etc
example[1]: The graph showed peaks and troughs of activity.
definition[2]: the hollow area between two waves
definition[3]: a long area of fairly low pressure between two areas of high pressure
definition[4]: the lowest point in a series of prices, values etc
example[2]: the peaks and troughs of investing in stocks and shares
example[3]: When would the nation come out of its economic trough?
